Organization based in.content:
Please analyze the given text to identify relationships where an organization is headquartered or primarily operates in a specific location. Look for patterns that indicate this type of relationship.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Organization', 'Location', 'Whether the Organization is based in the Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Aguadilla , Puerto Rico ;

Let's think step by step.

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Telesforo Rodriguez & Sons | Aguadilla, Puerto Rico | Yes |
| Parallel18 | Puerto Rico | Yes |
| Startup Ignition | Puerto Rico | Yes |
| Founder Institute | Puerto Rico | Yes |
| 500 Startups | San Juan, Puerto Rico | Yes |
| Techstars | San Juan, Puerto Rico | Yes |
| The Founder's Institute | San Juan, Puerto Rico | Yes |
| Startupbootcamp | San Juan, Puerto Rico | Yes |
| MassChallenge | Boston, Massachusetts | No |
| Y Combinator | Mountain View, California | No |
| 500 Startups | Silicon Valley, California | No |
| Techstars | Boulder, Colorado | No |

Note: The locations mentioned in the paragraph are Aguadilla, Puerto Rico, San Juan, Puerto Rico, Boston, Massachusetts, Mountain View, California, and Boulder, Colorado.

The pattern that indicates the relationship between an organization and its location is the mention of the organization's name followed by the location where it is based. For example, "Telesforo Rodriguez & Sons" is based in "Aguadilla, Puerto Rico".

The table above shows the organizations that are based in the locations mentioned in the paragraph. The "Yes" in the third column indicates that the organization is based in the location mentioned in the corresponding row.
